channel.title: Blogs on Devansh Agarwal
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Devansh Agarwal

item.title: Image Translation Autoencoders
item.description: Font Translation I was recently asked to make a neural network that would translate which translates images of one font to another for a job interview. As I enjoyed making the neural networks, I decided to write it up as a blog and put it online. The dataset The dataset had 129 images and was split at 3:1 for training and validation, respectively. Since it was for a job interview, the interviews had already taken out the test set.
